page.title: 06TRADE AND INDUSTRIES
page.content: IN GLENRIDDING THERE IS NOT MUCH EVIDANCE OF TRADE . THE GARAGE IS USED BY LOCALS AND TOURISTS . THERE ARE THREE SHOPS WHICH SELL ALLSORTS. THERE IS A PAPER SHOP AND A POST OFFICE. THERE ARE OTHER SHOPS WHICH ARE USED IN THE BOATING TRADE. THERE IS ONE SPECIALIST SHOP IN GLENRIDDING WHICH STOCKS CLIMBING EQUIPMENT. THERE ARE QUITE A FEW BED AND BREAKFAST PLACES BECAUSE TRIPPERS LIKE SOMEWHERE QUICK AND EASY. THE CHALETS ARE USED FOR FAMILES WHICH WOULD PREFER TO COME AND GO AS THEY PLEASED . THE PLUMBERS IN GLENRIDDING DO THE ODD JOBS THAT NEEDS DOING IN THE DALE. HOTELS ARE MAINLY FOR MIDDLE AGE FOLK BECAUSE THEY CANT BE BOTHERED WITH COOKING. MOUTAIN GUIDES ARE GOOD BECAUSE THE FELLS HERE CAN BE VERY CONFUSING.
